title: N Minimum Elements
description: In this lab, you will learn how to write a Python function that returns the n minimum elements from a given list, using built-in functions like `sorted()` and slice notation.

meta.title: Find the N Minimum Elements in a List
meta.description: This lab introduces the concept of writing a Python function that returns the n minimum elements from a given list, utilizing built-in functions such as `sorted()` and slice notation.
